title: Arkadi Monastery
text: The Arkadi Monastery is an Eastern Orthodox monastery, situated on a fertile plateau 23 km to the southeast of Rethymnon.
text2: Preveli Beach, Finikodasos is a beach located in the municipality of Agios Vasilios in the Rethymno
text3: Triopetrabeach owes its name to the three imposing rocks found in its waters. It is located 52 km south of Rethymno town and 13 km north of Akoumia village.
